panels.dialogue: Pocky: "We should split up! Cover more ground!" Prismor: "Agreed. Malrik and I will check the observatory. The celestial lenses are key."
panels.location: Everpeak Citadel interior corridors - white stone hallways with high vaulted ceilings. Ancient high elven architecture with elegant arches. Magical lanterns providing warm light. Winter decorations (festival ribbons, banners). Medieval fantasy castle interior.

panels.dialogue: Lunara: "I'll return to the garden with Marivielle. Check the Nature Essence directly." Val: "And I'll question the couriers. Someone must have seen something."
panels.location: Everpeak Citadel interior corridors - white stone hallways with high vaulted ceilings. Ancient high elven architecture with elegant arches. Magical lanterns providing warm light. Winter decorations (festival ribbons, banners). Medieval fantasy castle interior.

panels.visual: Split panel showing all investigations happening simultaneously: Pocky in library with Marge Prismor and Malrik in observatory Lunara in garden Val in courier headquarters
Marge showing Pocky crystal lenses Some are fake
panels.dialogue: Marge: "These should focus Celestial Essence. But they're counterfeits!" Pocky: "Someone replaced the True Lenses!"
